column4: Toyota sells all shares in Tesla as their tie-up ends
column5: TOKYO Toyota Motor Corp  said on Saturday it had sold all shares in Tesla Inc  by the end of 2016  having canceled its tie-up with the U.S. luxury automaker to jointly develop electric vehicles.

column4: Toyota sells all shares in Tesla as their tie-up ends
column5: TOKYO  June 3 Toyota Motor Corp said on Saturday it had sold all shares in Tesla Inc by the end of 2016  having cancelled its tie-up with the U.S. luxury automaker to jointly develop electric vehicles.
